body:
<html>
  <header>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
<style>
.body { background-color: #212529; margin: 0px;}
.header { background-color: #7287A3; }
nav ul { list-style: none; padding: 10px; display: flex; border-radius: 4px;  }
nav ul li { padding: 10px; flex: 1; text-align: center; }
.column { float: left; padding: 20px; background-color: #f5f5f5; border-radius: 5px; margin: 10px 20px }
.column.half { width: 48%;  ; }
.column.full { width: 96%;  }
.column.quarter { width: 23%; }
.last { margin-right: 0; }
.clearfix { overflow: auto; display: flex; justify-content: center;  }
a.button { padding: 10px 15px;  background-color: #007bff; color: white; border-radius: 4px; display: inline-block; text-decoration: none; }
a.button-header { padding: 10px 15px; margin: 10px 30px 10px 5px; background-color: #9ef9ff; color: black; font-size: 20px; border-radius: 4px; display: inline-block; text-decoration: none;}
</style>
    <title>Scaffold</title>
  </header>
  <body class="body">
    <main class="container">
      {}
 </main>
   </body>
</html>
